we need to be honoring our parents every

many people just like to do with
Mother's Day they pick that day to take
their dad out you know on a boat ride or
out to the restaurant or you know give

trashing him the rest of the year or
they wind up speaking bad about them or
they think that that's all that's
required of them remember the the the

and again you can just let your parents
know hey I love you I thank you so much
